short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Online Learning Support Net (OLSN) adds on-demand animated reading guidance and relevant reference support to online words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Online Learning Support Net (OLSN) provides instant help for reading and understanding online words.

With OLSN, clicking or touching a word immediately results in a popup box that contains two kinds of help: 1) visual hints and animated sound-out help for learning to read the word, 2) a word-specific reference library for help understanding the word (definitions, synonyms, roots, and translations).

OLSN can be used with most English language websites, including leading education and reference sites.
